channel.title: A tut for 562
channel.description:
This is my first Tutorial for a RSPS-->> HOW TO ADD a NPC
Difficult: Easy My Source: Jagex Scape Works on: 562 Sources.
First Go YourSeverName-->>Data Then Open "NPCS.xml" With WordPad or Notepad Under <list> add this
[code]<npc><id>"HERE NPC ID"</id><location><x>"HERE x-POS"</x><y>"HERE y-POS"</y><z>"HERE z-POS"</z></location></npc>[/code]
Then Run your Source and Tele To the X and Y pos and You Got itt .!! :) .

item.title: A tut for 562
item.dc:creator: @eri0nn eri0nn
item.description:
@eri0nn wrote:

This is my first Tutorial for a RSPS–>>
HOW TO ADD a NPC

Difficult: Easy
My Source: Jagex Scape
Works on: 562 Sources.

First Go YourSeverName–>>Data
Then Open “NPCS.xml” With WordPad or Notepad
Under add this

<npc><id>"HERE NPC ID"</id><location><x>"HERE x-POS"</x><y>"HERE y-POS"</y><z>"HERE z-POS"</z></location></npc>

Then Run your Source and Tele To the X and Y pos and You Got itt .!! .
